projects.description:
- Inspired by Windows 95, my personal portfolio puts a creative spin on a classic design
- Built with HTML, CSS, JS, and fetch API, it features interactive popups and a retro aesthetic

- Basic and advanced water conservation surveys designed for Veolia customers to better understand their water usage at home, furthering Veolia's mission of sustainability
- Built with Drupal 10, PHP, Twig, HTML, CSS, JS, the surveys are currently in production and actively used by thousands of customers
- Led to a part-time return offer from Veolia following the conclusion of my summer internship

- Pet adoption webapp with the purpose of simplifying the pet adoption process
- Inspired bby the ease of a Tinder-like swiping interface
- Built with HTML, CSS, JS, PHP, MySQL, Google Auth (with Firebase), and the Petfinder API to help users find their perfect pet match

- Website for non-profit organization focused on initiatives and events to make Boston greener
- Responsible for the design and code of the fixed elements (navigation bar and footer), homepage, contact page, and volunteer form page
- Built using HTML, CSS, JS, and jQuery

- Website for non-profit organization focused on planting trees around the globe
- Responsible for the entirety of the design and implementation of the website
- Built with HTML, CSS, and JS

projects.header: Huntington Breast Cancer Action Coalition Wellness App
projects.description:
- Wellness app made for HBCAC that allows users to create and track healthy habits in a fun, interactive way
- Responsible for leading the front-end development
- Built with Android Studio (Java), Dart, and Flutter

- Physical adaptation of the game 'Keep Talking and Nobody Explodes'
- Arduino + associated hardware and 3D printing

- Learning management system that helps students stay productive in the classroom in a fun, interactive way
- Includes both an admin/teacher and a student website
- Received 1st in NJ for TSA's 2023 Software Development Competition, qualifying for the national competition
- Built with HTML, CSS, JS, and Firebase for authentication and realtime database

projects.header: Morris County School of Technology Bus Application
projects.description:
- Application to help direct students to their bus
- Created with the purpose of saving paper and making dismissal more efficient in my high school
- In active use, used by hundreds of students every year
- HTML, CSS, JS, and Firebase for realtime database

- Designed to bring communities together through service
- Won 'Best Design' and 'Best in Show' for CCM's Mobile App Design Showcase
- Built with Android Studio (Java) and Firebase for authentication and realtime database

- Works to bridge the communication gap between ASL users and non-ASL users through AI recognition
- Received 2nd place at hackMCST VII (2022) in Denville, NJ
- Built with HTML, CSS, JS, and TensorFlow.js

Designed to help people who have communication difficulties effectively engage with their peers
- Allows users to create cards that can be pressed to form written and spoken sentences
- HTML, CSS, and JS
